pr_title: Add more info to getToken() method

timeline.message: Add more info to getToken() method

timeline.author: g2vinay

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/sdk/identity/azure-identity/src/main/java/com/azure/identity/ChainedTokenCredential.java b/sdk/identity/azure-identity/src/main/java/com/azure/identity/ChainedTokenCredential.java
index 137ce7636ac..8cef48f2a99 100644
--- a/sdk/identity/azure-identity/src/main/java/com/azure/identity/ChainedTokenCredential.java
+++ b/sdk/identity/azure-identity/src/main/java/com/azure/identity/ChainedTokenCredential.java

@@ -38,7 +38,7 @@ public class ChainedTokenCredential implements TokenCredential {
     }
 
     /**
-     * Sequentially calls {@link TokenCredential#getToken(TokenRequestContext)} on all the specified sources,
+     * Sequentially calls {@link TokenCredential#getToken(TokenRequestContext)} on all the specified credentials,
      * returning the first successfully obtained {@link AccessToken}.
      *
      * This method is called automatically by Azure SDK client libraries.
